resources.string:
Make extra money as a mechanic.

PM Mechanic the app for mechanics
-Turn your extra time into money as a mechanic with the new Mechanics app.

Why Us?
- We are the first in africa.
- Work at your own time.
- No offices, no bosses.
- You charge at your own rate.
- Enjoy fast customer support.

PM's mission is to bring fast and accessible mechanics to drivers and also look out for their safety, while helping thousands of mechanics support their families and also reduce the unemployment rate.
